globalHeaders.Content-Security-Policy: default-src 'self'; script-src 'self' 'unsafe-inline' 'unsafe-eval' https://www.googletagmanager.com; style-src 'self' 'unsafe-inline'; img-src 'self' data: https:; font-src 'self' data:; connect-src 'self' https://www.google-analytics.com; frame-ancestors 'none'; base-uri 'self'; form-action 'self'
